children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:37:10Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     208  10.152.183.20   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.79   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.239  no       Last written value=22546

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.152.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.152.73         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.152.75         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.152.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.152.72         Last written value=22546
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     208  10.152.183.20   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.79   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.239  no       Last written value=22546

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.152.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.152.73         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.152.75         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.152.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.152.72         Last written value=22546
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fac49ac7430>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fac49ac7430> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7fac49a45870>.model
